channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The suspect in the shooting of 2 Minnesota lawmakers has been captured and charged
item.description: Vance Boelter was captured in a wooded area on Sunday night, and charged in the shootings of two state lawmakers and their spouses. His first court ap...

item.title: This mother relies on SNAP to help feed her kids. Now, she's bracing for cuts

item.title: Israel hits more Iranian military targets, Iran retaliates on fourth day of conflict
item.description: Trump said Sunday he remained optimistic about Israel and Iran reaching a deal, but added "sometimes they have to fight it out."

item.title: Minnesota shooting suspect arrested. And, takeaways from Trump's military parade

item.title: MI6 gets its first female chief, years after Judi Dench played Bond's boss
item.description: It's a case of real life catching up with James Bond fiction: Britain's MI6 spy agency named its first-ever female chief. She used to be Q. Now she'll...

item.title: Gunmen storm Mexican village hall and shoot dead mayor
item.description: The mayor is the latest local official to be killed in an area of Mexico where organised crime holds sway.

item.title: Minnesota shooting suspect found in field and crawled to police, ending manhunt
item.description: Vance Luther Boelter is accused of killing Democrat Melissa Hortman and her husband Mark, and injuring two others.

item.title: Man suspected of shooting 2 Minnesota lawmakers charged with murder after surrendering to police
item.description: The man suspected of killing a Minnesota lawmaker and wounding another has been taken into custody, ending a nearly two-day search that put the entire...

item.title: The protesters and residents pushing back on tourism in Barcelona
item.description: Hostility towards tourists in Spain grows as locals complain of being forced out of their own cities.

item.title: 6/16: CBS Morning News
item.description: Suspect in Minnesota lawmakers' shootings is captured; Pacers and Thunder face off in Game 5 of NBA Finals in Oklahoma City.

item.title: Juror dismissed in Sean "Diddy" Combs trial
item.description: The judge in the Sean "Diddy" Combs sex trafficking and racketeering trial in NYC dismissed one of the jurors Monday.

item.title: WhatsApp to bring subscription model and ads to messaging platform
item.description: WhatsApp is rolling out new ad features including a subscription model that will allow channels to offer exclusive content for a monthly fee.

item.title: G7 is a big moment for Carney. Here are five things to watch
item.description: The gathering of leaders in Alberta will be a big test for Canada's new leader. We break down his challenges.

item.title: What we know about the attack on two Minnesota lawmakers
item.description: The attack on two Minnesota state lawmakers in their homes was described as politically motivated.

item.title: Friends say Minnesota shooting suspect was deeply religious and conservative
A teenager with a job making burritos became a powerful Minnesota lawmaker who trained service dogs
